mapper.select: SELECT emp_gen, COUNT(*) AS gen_cnt, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER ()) AS gen_ratio FROM emp GROUP BY emp_gen ORDER BY emp_gen

SELECT TO_CHAR(e.emp_date, 'YYYY') AS year, SUM(CASE WHEN r.rec_type = '경력' THEN subquery.cnt ELSE 0 END) as car_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN r.rec_type = '신입' THEN subquery.cnt ELSE 0 END) as new_cnt, SUM(subquery.cnt) as total_cnt FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN rec_info r ON e.rec_code = r.rec_code JOIN ( SELECT emp_no, COUNT(*) as cnt, emp_date FROM emp
WHERE emp_date >= DATE '2012-01-01' AND emp_date <= sysdate
GROUP BY emp_no, emp_date ) subquery ON e.emp_no = subquery.emp_no GROUP BY TO_CHAR(e.emp_date, 'YYYY') ORDER BY year

SELECT e.emp_no, SUM(wi.work_total) AS total_work FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN work_info wi ON e.emp_no = wi.emp_no
WHERE work_stime >= '2023-10-30' AND work_stime <= '2023-11-05'
AND e.emp_no = '199404001' GROUP BY e.emp_no
